properties.name: spring.sleuth.otel.propagation.sleuth-baggage.enabled
properties.description: Enable propagating baggage in a Sleuth compatible way (baggage key & value pair means e.g. a key & value HTTP pair).

properties.name: spring.sleuth.otel.propagation.composite-text-map-propagator.enabled
properties.description: Enable a composite text map propagator that can combine multiple propagation types into a single text map propagator.
